title: No, This Photographer Wasn’t Crying After Dhoni Got Run Out
subtitle: Photographer Cry after MS Dhoni Run Out Viral Phot: After India lost the World Cup semi-finals to New Zealand on Wednesday, 10 July, a photograph of a camera person crying started doing the rounds with a claim that he cried after MS Dhoni got run out
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
After India lost the World Cup semi-finals to New Zealand on Wednesday, 10 July, a photograph of a camera person crying started doing the rounds with a claim that he cried after MS Dhoni got run out.

The Quint also received a message related to the picture on its WhatsApp helpline number.
